title: TATE LAB BLUE SAPPHIRE RING, GOLD
description:
The Tate Cocktail Ring features a 2.5-carat oval lab-grown blue sapphire, encircled by oval blue sapphires and round white sapphires or diamonds. 
 Holiday Production Time: This made to order ring ships 5 - 7 weeks from purchase date.   Please place your order by November 1st for guaranteed delivery before December 25th. Orders placed after this date cannot be guaranteed to arrive in time for the holidays. 
Custom styles can only be returned for store credit.
details:
Metal: 18k gold coated silver or 14k yellow gold

Center stone: Lab-grown blue sapphire
Inner halo: Lab-grown blue sapphire
Outer halo: Lab-grown white sapphire or diamond
Stone shape: Oval cut center and inner halo, round cut outer halo

Size: 4-10


Lab-Grown Blue Sapphire and White Sapphire Carat: 


  Blue Sapphire Center Oval: 2.5 CTW DEW

Blue Sapphire Inner Halo: 1.92 CTW DEW

White Sapphire Outer Halo: 0.45 CTW DEW 


Lab-Grown Blue Sapphire and Diamond Carat: 


 Blue Sapphire Center Oval: 2.5 CTW DEW

Blue Sapphire Inner Halo: 1.92 CTW DEW
Diamond Outer Halo: 0.45 CTW E/F VS1 

Stone Color: E/F
Stone Clarity: VS1 
What is Lab-Grown?
